original: intros ys xs Hsub Hsorted. induction Hsub. - apply sorted_nil. - apply sorted_cons. + apply IHHsub. * apply subseq_cons_drop with (a:=a) in H. apply H. * apply subseq_cons_drop with (a:=a) in H0. apply H0. + apply sorted_cons_inv with (xs:=ys). * apply Hsorted. * apply subseq_trans with (ys:=ys). ++ apply H. ++ apply H0.
